Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2008 05:29PM WB36 wrote: Hi, I am 37 and am BRCA 2+ and just had a pbm which insurance paid for.  I think most will pay but it depends on what insurance you have.  When you find the procedure and doctor you want to use the billing office will know if your insurance will pay for it.
